body.name: Ninja SF301 Speedi Rapid Cooker & Air Fryer, 6-Quart Capacity, 12-in-1 Functions to Steam, Bake, Roast, Sear, Sauté, Slow Cook, Sous Vide & More, 15-Minute Speedi Meals All In One Pot, Sea Salt Gray
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by DiscountsJungle.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 3 mins.
features: ONE-TOUCH, ONE-POT MEALS IN 15 MINUTES: Choose your base, your vegetables, and your protein to create an entire meal in one pot in as little as 15 minutes with the Speedi Meals function.
CREATE A MEAL FOR UP TO 4: With 6-qt. capacity, fit up to 4 chicken breasts and 1 lb. of pasta to create a whole family meal in one pot.

12-IN-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Choose from Speedi Meals, Steam & Crisp, Steam & Bake, Steam, or Proof in Rapid Cooker mode and unlock Air Fry, Bake/Roast, Air Broil, Dehydrate, Sear & Sauté, Slow Cook, and Sous Vide functions in Air Fry mode.

RAPID COOKING SYSTEM: Quickly create moisture with steam while caramelizing and crisping with air fry technology at the same time in one pot when in Rapid Cooker mode to get restaurant-worthy results.
SMARTSWITCH FUNCTIONALITY: Easily switch between Air Fry mode and Rapid Cooker mode to unlock endless possibilities.
THOUSANDS OF SPEEDI MEALS: Ninja’s Speedi Meal Builder unlocks thousands of customizable recipes with ingredients that are already in your fridge or pantry.
AIR FRY HEALTHY MEALS: Up to 75% less fat when using the air fry function vs. traditional deep frying. Tested against hand-cut, deep fried French fries.
SPEEDI CLEANUP: Nonstick pot and crisper tray are dishwasher-safe, making cleanup quick and easy.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: 6-qt non-stick Cooking Pot & Multi-Functional Crisper Tray.
body.description: The Ninja Speedi Rapid Cooker & Air Fryer unlocks the ability to cook a complete, multi-textured meal in as little as 15 minutes, all in one pot. With 12-in-1 functionality and Ninja’s Rapid Cooking System, steam and air fry at the same time and create restaurant-quality meals from the comfort of your own home. With 6-qt. capacity, create thousands of recipes for a family of up to 4, all in one pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! Game changer!
reviews.reviewText: I can't even begin to tell you how much I love this rapid cooker from Ninja. I have their outdoor woodfire grill, and the outdoor woodfire oven, so when I was able to purchase this I almost didn't thinking the last thing I needed was another kitchen appliance. I am SO GLAD I went for the purchase! This cooker is so different that the others I mentioned as it truly is capable of cooking an all in one meal for myself and my husband as well as our family when they come for dinner. I was a bit nervous with learning how to use this because of all the different settings, but it is really easy. I did go on YouTube to watch how to use it and then I watched many of the cooks make different meals, so that is really helpful. There is also a great app that Ninja offers where you just add your base, protein, veggies, spices, etc... and it formulates a recipe with instructions on how to cook it. It is very easy to clean. It is large for the counters, but well worth the loss of space. However, what I do is put a large cutting board over my stovetop and place the Ninaji on there to cook. It works like a charm. My best advice is to purchase it and search "how tos" on Youtube and Instagram for more instruction. It is such a game changer!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's so good, I bought a second one.
reviews.reviewText: I receivedthe Ninja from my daughter as a gift. It is so easy to use and does such a great job, that I bought a second one to use in my second home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ninja Speedo takes food to another level.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love it. Quick , easy , easy clean up . I used my air fryer to make Lime Chicken tacos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love - A must for busy people/parents
reviews.reviewText: Update: cooks your chicken PERFECTLY if you put some water in the bottom!This is a game changer. As a single mom with a toddler that's super picky, I felt like I never ate well. I was always eating something I could throw in the microwave. This makes it super easy for me to make a quick high quality meal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product I’ve ever owned
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product based on the recommendation of a friend. I use this for everything, even toasting, bagels, or bread. With this machine, you don’t even need to use your oven or your stove. It’s amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I love ninja products. My sister had this air fryer and raved about it so I bought one for myself. It is very heavy which is a drawback but it heats quickly and is easy to clean. I like that you can cook an entire meal including sides and protein in one pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY to use
reviews.reviewText: Was a bit hesitant to buy this because I thought it might be difficult to use, but boy was I wrong, this is my go-to kitchen appliance now, so easy to use and the clean-up is a breeze. It takes up some counter space but well worth it because it's used a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE my Ninja Speedi.I live in the South It’s HOT. Cooking on a stovetop or in an oven makes it unbearable. This is my first countertop cooking appliance. I am THRILLED to have it. I am older and gun shy to pressure cookers. I LOVE being able to lift the lid to check on things. It cooks delicious full meals with NO added heat in the house, few pots and pans, (if any) and in less time. There are so many options. I am having fun learning the ins and outs of cooking with it. The air fryer is amazing. Switching from one method to another is super easy! A flip of a switch and a change to temp/time settings. I baked a chocolate cake that was very moist and dangerously delicious. The 6 quart is PERFECT for my husband and I. We usually have leftovers when I make a Speedi Meal. The app for the meal builder is very helpful for finding a recipe on the fly. My Speedi lives on my counter in my small kitchen. I GLADLY give up the space to have this Ninja in my kitchen.
es un muy buen producto, facil de usar y lo mas importante de limpiaraltamente recomendable

This is one of the most useful appliances I have ever had. It is practical, shortens the time one has to spend cooking, It has different programs for different needs. I have been using air fryers for over 3 years and they are definitely convenient and they save you a lot of money in energy bills. However, this speedy meal feature is a game changer. It works very well for my little family of 3 and given that we usually don't eat huge meals. I have tasted different options, but my favourite so far has been asparagus. They are much better than grilled asparagus! Chicken breast also cooks nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 26, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Es un súper producto, el electrodoméstico que necesitas para facilitar tu vida a la hora de la cocina, puedes hacer una comida completa es menos de 20 minutos!!! De verdad la amo, me ayuda mucho a optimizar los tiempos
